title: ICAI Revises Fees for CA Exam Answer Book Verification & Certified Copies
content:
# ICAI Revises Fees for CA Exam Answer Book Verification & Certified Copies

Ek important update hai for all CA students! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne CA examination answer books ki verification aur certified copies provide karne ki fees revise kar di hain. This revision is effective from January 2026 onwards.

Here's a quick lowdown on the changes:

*   **Old Fee for Verification:** Earlier, the fee for verification of answer books was INR 100 per paper.
*   **New Fee for Verification:** Ab, this has been reduced to **INR 50 per paper**.
*   **Old Fee for Certified Copies:** For obtaining certified copies of answer books, the fee was INR 500 per paper.
*   **New Fee for Certified Copies:** This has also seen a significant reduction to **INR 100 per paper**.

This change, announced on December 18, 2025, aims to make the process more accessible for students.
